title: As a user I want merging 2 International Player profiles to send the information to LARI
custom_preconds: GIVEN an International Player Profile has already been sent to LARI
custom_steps: WHEN the International Player Profile associated with a player ID a that has already been sent to LARI is merged with another International Player Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the information should be communicated to LARI. 
AND fields and methods of communication should follow documentation found here: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4.1+Profile+fields

title: As a User, I want new Winter League Requests entered into the WLP to be sent to ebis
custom_preconds: GIVEN a RESTful interface for the Winter League Portal exists in EBIS
custom_steps: WHEN a new Request is created in the WLP
custom_expected:
THEN the following fields should be sent to ebis:
 -- Player First Name
 -- Player Last Name
 -- ebisID (player ID)
 -- Requesting Team (ebis club ID)
 -- Status: Requested
 -- Request Date
AND a new Winter League Request should be created and submitted to Club in ebis, with all relevant submission updates being performed as though it was submitted within ebis, including the appropriate notifications and action items

title: As a User, I want the cancellation of Requests in the WLP sent back to EBIS
custom_preconds: GIVEN a RESTful interface exists in EBIS for cancelling a Winter League Request in the Winter League Portal
custom_steps: WHEN a Winter League Request is cancelled in in the WLP
custom_expected:
THEN fields passed in should match the fields passed in for a new request
AND the fields passed in should be:
-- ebisID (player ID)
-- Requesting Team (ebis club ID)
-- Request Date
AND system should find pending to club requests that match the passed in data
AND these requests in EBIS should be deleted
AND system should return a generic JSON object to WLP with a boolean indicating success/failure as well as a list of error messages

title: As a User, I want Agreements Reached sent to ebis
custom_preconds: GIVEN a RESTful interface exists in EBIS for "Agreements Reached" on a Granted Winter League Request in the Winter League Portal
custom_steps: WHEN an agreement is reached on a granted Winter League Request in in the WLP
custom_expected:
THEN fields passed in should match the fields passed in for a new request 
AND fields passed in should be:
 -- ebisID (player ID)
 -- Requesting Team (ebis club ID)
 -- Request Date
 -- Agreement Reached Flag
 AND agreement Reached checkbox should be checked on the Winter League Request in EBIS
AND system should return a generic JSON object to WLP with a boolean indicating success/failure as well as a list of error messages

title: As a User, I want the granting of Requests sent back to the WLP
custom_preconds: GIVEN RESTful service between EBIS and WLP for granting requests
custom_steps: WHEN a Request is granted in EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN the following fields should be sent to the WLP
 -- ebisID (player_id)
 -- Requesting Team (club_id)
 -- Request Date (request_date)
 -- Status: G  (status)
 -- Username granting/denying (username)
 AND the fields should be sent as a JSON object with field names noted in parens above

title: As a User, I want the denying of Requests sent back to the WLP
custom_preconds: GIVEN RESTful service between EBIS and WLP for denying requests
custom_steps: WHEN a Request is denied in EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN the following fields should be sent to the WLP:
 -- ebisID (player_id)
 -- Requesting Team (club_id)
 -- Request Date (request_date)
 -- Status: D  (status)
 -- Username granting/denying (username)
AND the fields should be sent as a JSON object with field names noted in parens above

title: Winter League ETL
custom_preconds: GIVEN ETL for Winter League request data has been run into EBIS 2.5
custom_steps: WHEN user views any field related to WLRs that have been brought over from EBIS1
custom_expected: THEN all data values in EBIS 2.5 should match the values in EBIS1

title: Winter League Request Bridging
As a user I want to be able to run the Capitalized Payments by Year report
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Report listing widget
custom_expected:
THEN "Capitalized Payments by Year" report should be listed in the Report listing widget. 
AND Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: Custom Prompt for Capitalized Payments Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to run the Capitalized Payments Report from Reports Listing Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the hyperlink for the report
custom_expected:
THEN a custom UI prompt should display
AND this prompt should be styled similar to other EBIS custom UI report prompts
AND parameters should match Prompts documentation in wiki (https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=EBIS&title=Capitalized+Payments+-+Prompts)

title: Arbitration ETL
custom_preconds: GIVEN an ETL for Arbitration data has been run into EBIS 2.5 from EBIS 1
custom_steps: WHEN user views any field related to Arbitration that has been brought over from EBIS1
custom_expected: THEN values in all fields brought over to EBIS 2.5 should match values populated in EBIS 1

title: As a user I want hitting cancel to trigger a modal asking me to confirm that I want to cancel changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in Arb Eligible Utility in edit mode
and user makes some changes
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking cancel while in edit mode will trigger the "Are you sure modal"
AND Clicking yes cancels changes and toggles the form back to view mode
AND Clicking no dismisses the modal and the form remains in edit mode

title: As a user I want Finalizing the arb utility to trigger a modal asking me to confirm that I want to Finalize
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in arb utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Finalize
custom_expected:
THEN system will trigger the "Are you sure modal"
AND Clicking yes cancels changes and toggles the form back to view mode
AND Clicking no dismisses the modal and the user is returned to the form

title: As a User, I want to export the Arb Eligibles Utility to excel
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Export button on the form
AND Clicking the Export button will run the Arb Eligibles Utility Export Report

title: Arbitration Bridging
As a user I want to always see the table headers when scrolling through Arbitration eligible players
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is view Arbitration eligible players list in arb utility
custom_steps: WHEN user scrolls through Arbitration eligible players table
custom_expected:
THEN user should see the table headers when scrolling through
AND the table should have a fixed height and show 8-10 rows of data at a time

title: As a user I want to see arrows on the previous and next buttons on the info modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Hearing Info modal in edit or view mode
custom_expected:
THEN user should see arrows on the previous and next buttons on the info modal

Wireframe:
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=hearing_modal

title: Fix UI of Advanced Search for smaller screens
custom_preconds: GIVEN user logs in on screen sizes below 768px
custom_steps: WHEN the user goes to Advanced Search
custom_expected:
THEN Remove the ">" to the right of Search For
AND Move the Search for dropdown beneath the text Search for
AND Move the Saved Searches dropdown beneath the Search for dropdown
AND Make the Search button span the full width of the button container

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=mobile_2

title: As a User, I want to Export the DL Summary Report to Excel
custom_preconds: GIVEN  EBIS1 "Run Excel Report" version of the "Disabled List Summary Report" has been replicated in EBIS2
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to reports widget
custom_expected:
THEN the popup to run the "Disabled List Summary Report" report should have a "Run Excel" button which generates this document
AND  columns and layout of the printed excel report will match ebis1

title: As a BOC User, I want to add a player to the Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the BOC user is in Arb Eligibles Utility in Edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on 'Add Player' button on the page
custom_expected:
THEN system will add a new row to the bottom utility
AND the table will auto scroll to the newly added row
AND the Player column of the new row will be an autocomplete search that mimics the global quick search functionality (both in display and population)
AND Selecting a player will populate the following columns:
 -- Org
 -- EOS MLS
 -- Pos
 -- Elig Count
 -- Arb Status (if applicable, if not leave blank)
 -- PY Salary
 -- PY+1 (if applicable, if not leave blank)
NOTE: This can be done at any time, even after the results are marked final

title: Arb Eligibles Utility Permissions - Club MJ Contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN Arb Eligibles Utility permission varies for different Club users
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Arb Eligibles Utility
custom_expected:
THEN Club Admin will have the following permission
 - View, Update
AND Club Basic will have the following permission
 - View

title: As a user I do not want to scroll horizontally when viewing a table widget on screen sizes smaller than 768px
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged into system on screen size smaller than 768px
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing a table widget on screen sizes smaller than 768px
custom_expected:
THEN
- Identify 2-3 columns to display by default in the table widget
- All other columns can be accessed via an expand icon in a vertical table
- The widgets should have no horizontal scrolling on smaller screen sizes
- Come up with priority order for widgets to optimize for mobile, assuming this will be a 1widget at a time effort.

title: As a user I want to be able to sort the Recertification utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Recertification utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the header of any column in the Recertification screen
custom_expected:
THEN system will sort by the column. 
AND For the Recert due column, the sort should be on the first date displayed. 
AND Column headers should now be blue
AND The column being sorted on should have global styling added(grey background and the red up/down arrow next to the column header)
